message: Let's make a deal. I take $70, you take $30. It's a good offer, considering the inflation.
I'm proposing a fairer split. Since the money is worth less each round, let's be reasonable and split it closer to 50/50. Take $45 and we'll be done with this!
Bob, let's be realistic. The value is dropping fast for both of us. I'm offering you $40, which is more than you would have gotten last round.  Don't let greed make you lose out!
